channel.title: Barrage help

item.title: Barrage help
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapePwns MoparScapePwns
item.description:
@MoparScapePwns wrote:

Need a tut for makin it hit only one at a time and i cant find one
My ice barrage code

if(magicID == 12891){ // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1){ if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)){ sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)){ deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); } } if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
